name: Resort Juice Bar & BBQ Stand
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming the cooking world best cooking chef restaurant manager, by playing, one of the top chef games or restaurant simulator games? Than welcome to the Resort Juice bar & BBQ Stand is kitchen game where restaurant simulator never closes and the waiters & managers always have big smiles on their faces feel the kitchen food fever. Resort Juice bar & BBQ Stand is a beautiful kitchen cooking game that tests your crazy cooking chef skills, time management & serving skills so as to serve the hungry customers & make them happy at party in resort juice bar & bbq stand. Make fresh juice for the customers at party in resort on their summer vacations and help them freshen up by serving them the fresh juices. Meet unique customers at party in resort, serve and delight them with new rich and delectable food recipes, and earn Coins and Tips. Many of the customers will be coming to your juice bar at the resort this summer vacation to get fresh juice. You have to serve customers who visit your restaurant simulator with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn money. Make customers happy by revealing the master chef inside you & write your own kitchen story. Kitchen game cooking fever is back especially for the home cooking chef who have cooking craze, it’s more than fun to take food orders from the happy customers. Use your authentic crazy cooking chef recipes and special ingredients to prepare a delicious bbq meal. So Fire up your BBQ grill & start writing your kitchen story in this fun time management crazy cooking game and create your own restaurant story to be told over and over among friends & family.

Resort Juice bar & BBQ Stand is an addicting time management crazy cooking game that features endless play. Resort Juice bar & BBQ Stand teaches you how to cook delicious dishes and manage your own restaurant simulator and become a true super chef master in kitchen chef cooking world! So what’s better than a flaming hot juicy bbq paired with a sideline and a sweet soda from bar to satisfy the cravings of your hungry customers. You can cook for multiple customers at same time to improve your crazy cooking chef & time management skills within your cafe or restaurant simulator. So take command of the kitchen game and demonstrate the skills of a master cooking chef. Choose the right ingredients according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw it in the trash. The customers and food orders will increase with your increasing chef popularity on city street. Make the best cooking craze strategy that will help you earn coins and unlock exciting crazy cooking world food items and utensils to expand your food business and cater more customer in minimum time. Remember don’t let the diner get angry at their food orders. Become a cooking craze chef and build your bakery, cafe, diner or restaurant simulator in crazy cooking world the best food and drinks in a kitchen game that lets you play as a restaurant manager.

Resort Juice bar & BBQ Stand Features:
* Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals.
* Unlock new recipes and grow your food menu.
* Race against time to prepare catering orders.
* Earn money and great prizes for finishing catering orders!
* Become the master of this kitchen game & cooking world!
* Fulfill the orders of Hungry Customers in cooking world.
